@ quible: I used to script unattended application installs, you can find great guides @ MSFN ;)
I modify the skins (dll's) by editing them with a resource hacker (I'm using Restorator 2007)
I've removed the Feature Icons and the New DVD Release section from the resume page by editing XML\PRELOADSKIN.XML
You can change the background by replacing the IMAGE\INITIAL PNGs
